elements.name: cashAssetsDescription
elements.title: Description of asset
elements.description: Include the type of cash asset, for example, cash, savings account, chequing account. For bank accounts, include the name of the banking institution.

elements.name: cashAssetsValue
elements.title: Current value of asset
elements.description: You may be the only owner of an asset, or you may be a joint owner. For assets that you jointly own, you must only put the value for the percentage that you own.
